1084230.name: Don't Look Down Demo
1084230.description:
Come see what the latest craze in VR climbing and action is all about!

Enjoy learning the ropes (sometimes literally on ropes!) of our fluid and intuitive movement system. Dive into unique levels peppered with examples of all the awesome content Don't Look Down has to offer!

    Features[/h2]
  • Great climbing, flinging, and bot-smashing VR action at the low, low price of FREE
  • Two exclusive levels not found in the full consumer release
  • Local and online ghost racing -- race against your best times or the times of the fastest players in the world!
  • Preview of Customization Shop and Difficulty Mods
1084230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
